name: Northwerds
description:
A top down shooter inspired by Total Carnage. I'm currently working on this in my spare time, so it's definitely a work in progress.  I encourage all the feedback I can get.  

  • I plan on adding a tons more enemies, power ups and missions.
  • I forgot to add sound and music. Doh!
  • Windows may popup a warning when you run it. It's safe.

If you like it, please feel free to buy me a cup of coffee. Thanks. ;)

Enjoy! =D
